text: Jean-Baptiste-Camille Corot (16 July 1796 â€“ 22 February 1875) was a French landscape and portrait painter as well as a printmaker in etching. He is a key figure in landscape painting, and painted many works. He was in the Neo- Classical tradition, but he anticipated the "en plein air" (painting outside in front of the scenery) of impressionism. ==Other websites== * Over 600 works by Jean-Baptiste-Camille Corot * Jean-Baptiste-Camille Corot at the WebMuseum Category:1796 births Category:1875 deaths Category:Artists from Paris Category:French painters Category:Engravers
title: Jean-Baptiste-Camille Corot
